About me!

游꿉 My Education:

I am a Graduate in Biology from the University of La Laguna (ULL), due to my interest in the life sciences and how to make decisions based on scientific knowledge to solve problems.

On the other hand, I am passionate about computing and data analysis, which allows me to analyze my data and present interesting ways to share my discoveries. For this reason, I specialized with an Official Master's Degree in Bioinformatics thanks to the International University of Valencia (VIU).

游눺 My Professional Experience:

My academic studies have provided me with job opportunities such as working in the General Research Support Service (SEGAI) at the University of La Laguna (ULL), where I worked as a technician in the animal housing and laboratory. Currently, I am on a secondment in the Environmental Technical Service of the Cabildo of Gran Canaria as a Environmental Technician, Graduate in Biology..

What is my professional goal?

My professional focus is oriented towards developing technical skills, as I firmly believe in their value to solve complex problems and provide practical solutions in the workplace. My main interest is to continue growing as a specialized technician, combining my academic knowledge with the experience I gain to effectively face the challenges of the professional world.
